website_summaries.verdict: Take this item along in your golf cart, and enjoy clean clubs and debris-free golf balls throughout your game.
pros: Bristle cleaning action for a deep clean
This item can clean your clubs, too
Price is decent considering the benefits it provides
cons: Somewhat difficult to transport when full of water
It's larger than some other portable ball washer options, and some have difficulty mounting it to cart

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT 2007 CLUB CAR PRECEDENT!
customer_reviews.text: I give this three stars because it APPEARS to be of good quality, but I was not able to mount it to my 2007 Club Car Precedent even though it was advertised to fit. The box included what were supposed to be mounting hardware for various golf cart brands, but they in no way came close to working on my cart. The instructions are pretty minimal also. I will have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Handy little gadget. Brushes were a little looser than ...
customer_reviews.text: Handy little gadget. Brushes were a little looser than I have experienced in similar washers--that necessitates a little more scrubbing to get club cleaned. However, was able to get larger clubs (3 wood and 430CC driver) into washer that tighter washers would not handle.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyBob

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit on my ezgo golf cart well. Had to make some modifications to attach it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Golf ball washer
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what my husband needed for his golf cart. It is perfect and price was also a very good deal. Thank you for having such good bargains
customer_reviews.author: Betty Maupins

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: This golf club and ball washer is doing just what is designed to do. It was at a fair price also. Kathy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some what hard to install. Balls will not rotate ...
customer_reviews.text: Some what hard to install. Balls will not rotate in washer, you have to take them out and rotate it and wash again
customer_reviews.author: Richard Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: The bristles inside the club cleaner box are so far apart there’s basically no resistance to clean the club grooves. It’s basically a box of water
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice addition to golf cart, was very east to put on.
customer_reviews.author: golfer1204

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: Brushes not very strong. Had hard time installing. Did not use
customer_reviews.author: al belsky

customer_reviews.title: Very functional for the job
customer_reviews.text: action works good, cleans balls and clubs really good. Installed where an older washer was and it adapted to old mounting points.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Harp

customer_reviews.title: Brush is too soft
customer_reviews.text: Bristles on the brushes are too soft to do a good job when cleaning the golf club
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: The ball washer is fine
customer_reviews.text: We're still trying to build a bracket to mount it on the cart. The ball washer is fine otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Earle Romak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's great to put clubs away clean after golfing All carts should have one
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Anderson

product_meta.title: Golf Club and Golf Ball Washer Golf Cart Ball Washer
product_meta.description:
* 
 * 
 * Mounts on Top Post On Most Golf Carts
   
   
 * Durable Black Plastic Includes Hardware For Easy Installation
   
   
 * Hardware Spacers Included work on EZ-GO (3/4" x 1-5/8"), and Club Car (2" x 1") golf carts
   
   
 * Also Includes and Additional Spacer for 1" x 1" Posts
   
   
 * Includes Attached Rubber Water Stopper/Plug
   
   
 * Please Measure Posts PRIOR to purchasing to ensure the correct size post you will be mounting to
   
   
 * Length: 10.5", Width: 6.5", Depth: 6"
feature_bullets: One Brand New Gold Club and Golf Ball Washer
Mounts on Top Post On Most Golf Carts
Durable Black Plastic Includes Hardware For Easy Installation
Hardware Spacers Included work on EZ-GO (3/4" x 1-5/8"), and Club Car (2" x 1") golf carts
Also Includes and Additional Spacer for 1" x 1" Posts
